name: Hedron Online: An exciting new MMORPG
blurb: An MMORPG that returns the fun factor to online gaming by going back to its roots

rewards.reward: We want to reward you even if you just give $1!  You'll get a free 1 month subscription and I'll personally send you an autographed  (oooh aaah) printout of the first map design as seen in the video, 2 free tootsie rolls, and a couple free stickers!  I know it's not fancy but every little bit helps us!
Free Hedron T-shirt!  Free 3 month subscription to the game; thank you on an in-game monument plaque; thank you in credits on game website; access to backers only updates
Free 9 month subscription to the game when it launches; All of above; your own tree (of your choice) in the forest of creation or in a town of your choice*; Participate in the final beta
Free10 month subscription to the game; All of above; participate in the the final 2 betas; get to name a MOB**; get to name an NPC**

Free 1 year subscription to the game; All of above; get to name one of the game deities**; get to name a town or dungeon**; get to name an elite boss MOB**; get an in-game limited edition piece of armor or clothing for one of your game characters

Free 2 year subscription to the game; All of above; a MOB will be named after you or your game character**; an NPC will be named after you or your game character**; a town or dungeon will be named after you or your game character**; an elite boss MOB will be named after you or your game character**; a personalized thank you card signed by the game creation team

Free 5 year subscription to the game; all of above; get a limited edition piece of armor or clothing for 2 of your game characters; your own house in the game for one of your characters**; a zone or dungeon designed with your concept in mind**; 1 framed authentic, original concept art piece autographed by the game creation team

Free lifetime subscription to the game; All of above; get a limited edition piece of armor or clothing for all of your game characters; 3 framed, authentic, original concept art piece autographed by the game creation team; a quest in the game that is designed based on your concept**; an in-game monument statue in your honor; a personalized, hand-crafted thank you card from Jen\u2019s (one of the game creators) daughter; some in-game money to start your first character out with (amount to be determined at a later date); a village designed with your concept, in your honor, with an NPC baron named after you & incorporated into the storyline**; get to name a server**
